Pre-Game Insights: Germany and Hungary face each other in the first match of the UEFA Nations League in League A, Group 3.
Germany was the host of Euro 2024 and was among the national favorites to win the trophy but was defeated by Spain in the quarter-finals.
Hungary plays for the second time in a row in League A of the UEFA Nations League after being promoted consecutively from League C to League B and from League B to League A.
In the previous edition of the UEFA Nations League, Hungary finished in 2nd place in a group with Italy, Germany, and England.
